com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.transform

Class VariableEliminator.Var

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.transform.VariableEliminator.Var
  • Enclosing class:
    VariableEliminator

    public static class VariableEliminator.Var
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information about a single variable for use by variable eliminator.

    Public methods are available for use by VariableEliminator.CostFunction implementations.
